page.title: 19Rector of Haworth (cont.)
page.content: people today.The novels elevate the role of women and stress the need for education.The present church is{104} years old,rebuilt since the {Brontes'} time but they would recognise the { {Services of 1662 Prayer Book}still in use and many hymns.Some of their poems are now used as hymns.A normal Sunday morning congregation would be 140 but for special occasions like the{Bronte {Society}annual service would rise to 300.The{Rector}receives many letters,complaints,requests for access to parish records which go back to{ {1640,}and acts as a figurehead for the village as there is now no parish council.The church is involved in much charity work but its main aim is still to go out in a loving and caring way to bring the good news to the community.
